mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation_tbl (id, movieCode, movieTitle, theaterPlace, theater, ticketPrice, reservationDate, movieDate, reservationTime, seats, visitors) VALUES (#{id}, #{movieCode}, #{movieTitle}, #{theaterPlace}, #{theater}, #{ticketPrice}, NOW(), #{movieDate}, #{reservationTime}, #{seats}, #{visitors})
mapper.update: UPDATE movie_tbl SET cnt = #{cnt+1 } WHERE movieCode = #{movieCode};
